title: The Ballpark | Extra Innings: Finding Success as a Phelan US Centre Undergraduate Research Assistant, with Karen Torres
itunes:author: Karen Torres, Joss Harrison
description: Contributor(s): Karen Torres, Joss Harrison | They also discuss her co-authored article with Dr Collins in the Journal of Illicit Economies and Development, which focuses on Colombia’s place in the global drug wars. This Extra Inning was produced by Anderson Tan, Elina Ganatra and Joss Harrison.
